value.title: DAX Fridays! #91: Sum child values into the parent
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show you how to sum child values into the parent when you are dealing with hierarchies in Power BI.  This video is based on an example shown in the previous DAX Fridays! video, so I recommend you to watch that first: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e8OWQ7Xl3m0  Happy holidays!

value.title: DAX Fridays! #95: Binning, Frequency and relative frequency | Data profiler
value.excerpt: This is the first of a series of videos about data profiling and descriptive statistics. In today's video, I will show you how to bin data,  calculate the frequency and relative frequency using DAX.  What you think about the series? let me know in the comment box. value.title: Fix the "Enter data" limitation in Power Query
value.excerpt: If you are trying to import data in Power BI using Power Query "Enter Data", you might see this message: "The clipboard contents are too large to be pasted into the table. Please split your data into multiple tables with less than 3,000 cells".  In this video I will show you one way to get around it.
